sentences.sentence: There were ominous dark clouds gathering overhead.
sentences.translation: 不祥的阴霾在头顶上汇聚。

sentences.sentence: There was an ominous silence at the other end of the phone.
sentences.translation: 电话那端是一阵不祥的沉默。

sentences.sentence: She picked up the phone but there was an ominous silence at the other end.
sentences.translation: 她拿起电话，但对方只有不祥的沉默。
